alert.note: Alert for Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy; Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 3:59PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Hidalgo, northwestern Cameron and southwestern Willacy Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 358 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lyford, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Harlingen, Raymondville, Elsa, Edcouch, Santa Rosa, Lyford, La Villa, Sebastian, Primera and Wilson Elementary School. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy; Southern Hidalgo
